meanings.definition: A type of fish that can inflate itself when threatened.
meanings.sent1: The swellfish puffed up to scare away the predator.
meanings.sent2: I saw a swellfish blow itself up like a balloon in the water.
meanings.sent3: The swellfish at the aquarium made funny faces by puffing up.
meanings.sent4: Her anger made her feel like a swellfish, ready to expand and defend herself.
meanings.sent5: The swellfish's ability to inflate itself is like a natural defense mechanism.

meanings.definition: To become larger or rounder in size.
meanings.sent1: If you keep blowing air into the balloon, it will swellfish.
meanings.sent2: The dough will swellfish as it rises in the warm oven.
meanings.sent3: The balloon started to swellfish so much that it popped!
meanings.sent4: His ego began to swellfish after receiving praise for his work.
meanings.sent5: The river tends to swellfish during the rainy season, flooding the nearby fields.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is excellent or impressive.
meanings.sent1: She is a swellfish in the world of art, admired by many.
meanings.sent2: The new sports car is a real swellfish with its sleek design.
meanings.sent3: The cake she baked was a swellfish, everyone loved it!
meanings.sent4: His performance on stage was a swellfish, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The ancient castle stood on the hill like a swellfish, commanding attention from afar.
